title: Ticket #91: PrivSep: Create_Process errors do not result in job being held
description: In the Starter, we respond to certain failure conditions by placing the job on hold. Examples include the executable not being found or not having execute permission (i.e. ENOENT or EACCES from exec()). When PrivSep is enabled on the execute-machine, some of these types of failures do not have this effect.
creator: gquinn
